title: The London Ear, Sunday 20th March
desc: on a Sunday morning. From church bells to road crossings, we'll turn an inquisitive ear to the noises that control, affect and define us. We?ll tune into sounds of the past, like the birdsong that triggered a bucolic hallucination and the metallic scraping commemorated in a street name. And we'll  ?through back alleys and round skyscrapers. The London Ear offers a fresh perspective on the City of London, by thinking about sound and the act of listening.
